resources.string: Pozorovanie nebolo úplné, takže nebolo uložené. Chýbala poloha alebo fotka.
Pozorovania sú dostupné iba prihláseným používateľom. Prihláste sa, prosím, cez Ponuku alebo kliknutím na tlačidlo "Pozorovanie".
Public observations are visible only for subscribed users.
Your observations made within subscrition period will be persisted during application\'s life.
Your observations made within subscrition period will be persisted during application\'s life.

Your observation\'s date, location and note are persisted without subscription, but photos are stored only on the device. You will lose them when you\'ll clear data, reinstall or switch device. You are about to subscribe for persisiting your observations (photos) accross all your devices> With subscription you\'ll be able to see observations made by other subscribed users. Based on these observations distribution maps will be created along with other, not yet implemented, goodies.
Based on these observations distribution maps will be created along with other, not yet implemented, goodies.

You are about to subscribe for saving and persisting your photos across all your devices. With subscription you\\\'ll agree with sharing your observations with other subscribed users. You\\\'ll also be able to see their observations.
If you still hesitate to hit button below, there is 30 days trial period for both kind of subscriptions.
